thread.title: Free pair of gardening gloves
thread.title_full: Free pair of gardening gloves - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free pair of gardening gloves
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with Homebase to offer readers a free pair of All Purpose Worker Gloves worth £5.99. The gloves have a latex palm with nylon back and liner, providing great grip for multi-tasking around your home and garden. They are available in sizes medium and large. Plus, you can also save £5 when you spend £20 or more on garden products at Homebase. Choose from outdoor furniture, quality garden tools, beautiful garden plants and pots, and essential maintenance items such as hoses and plant food. How to Claim See the paper on Sunday, August 9, 2015 to claim this exclusive offer. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
